feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:09 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 05:50 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: SE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
